Method Detail

enableHDMIDetection

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE enableHDMIDetection(android.content.Context context,
                                                   boolean value)
Enable/disable check HDMI connection detection

Parameters:
context - [in] Context.
value - [in] Enable/disable; true to enable HDMI detection, false to disable.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.

isHDMIDetectionSupported

boolean isHDMIDetectionSupported()
Check if HDMI connection detection is supported

Returns:
true if HDMI connection detection is supported, false if not supported.

getHDMIStatus

VOCommonPlayerHDMI.VO_OSMP_HDMI_CONNECTION_STATUS getHDMIStatus()
Check if HDMI is connected

Returns:
HDMI connection state, refer to VOCommonPlayerHDMI.VO_OSMP_HDMI_CONNECTION_STATUS.

setOnHDMIConnectionChangeListener

VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE setOnHDMIConnectionChangeListener(VOCommonPlayerHDMI.onHDMIConnectionChangeListener listener)
Set a listener for get HDMI Connection change callback

Parameters:
listener - [in] Listener, an onHDMIConnectionChangeListener instance.
Returns:
VOOSMPType.VO_OSMP_RETURN_CODE.VO_OSMP_ERR_NONE if successful.
